Actors: Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough, James Donald
Writer: Paul Brickhill (book), James Clavell (screenplay), W.R. Burnett (screenplay)
Title: The Great Escape
Plot: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 9 nominations.
